main event: A bright circular flying object was observed over Finland on 25th Sep 1954, flying at 300 meters, giving off an intense light and leaving a trail of reddish smoke, visible for 7 seconds.
interesting points: The UFO sightings occurred across various European countries including Austria, France, Germany, Italy, Rome, and the Netherlands during the period from 11 July-30 Sep 1954.
The sightings included observations of disc-like objects, luminous circular objects, and mysterious flying objects with varying sizes and behaviors.
Some of the sightings were evaluated as possible meteorite or balloon sightings, while others had insufficient data for evaluation.
The UFO sightings in 1954 resulted in an increase in public interest and publicity, as well as influencing a great number of persons for personal publicity.
Dr. D. Keyhoe's book, which detailed UFO sightings, was translated into various foreign languages and corroborated the increase in UFO sightings during the summer of 1954.
